text: (jakat ennum) tanankal tarittirarkalukkum, elaikalukkum, tanattai vacul ceyyum uliyarkalukkum, islattin pal avarkal ullankal irkkappatuvatarkakavum, atimaikalai vitutalai ceyvatarkakavum, katan pattiruppavarkalukkum, allahvin pataiyil (por purivorukkum), valippokkarkalukkume uriyavai. (Itu) allah vititta katamaiyakum - allah (yavum) aripavan, mikka nanamutaiyon
